about_the_game:
"HoloCall" is a fan-made music rhythm game inspired by hololive.

You can choose your favorite hololive songs to play.

In the game, notes fall along with the rhythm. You need to press the keys in time with the notes and rhythm, and shout out the calls using your microphone when prompted to score high points.

Each song offers four difficulty levels, allowing everyone, from rhythm beginners to experts, to enjoy the fun of cheering and calling.

For those unfamiliar with hololive, we hope you'll discover its charm through our energetic, heart-moving songs.

For hololive fans, this game serves as a practice tool for live concert calls.

And for those who couldn't get concert tickets, we hope this game provides some comfort and lets you experience the unity of a live venue.

※Powered by "CRIWARE".CRIWARE is a trademark of CRI Middleware Co., Ltd.

"HoloCall" is a fan-made music rhythm game inspired by hololive.

You can choose your favorite hololive songs to play.

In the game, notes fall along with the rhythm. You need to press the keys in time with the notes and rhythm, and shout out the calls using your microphone when prompted to score high points.

Each song offers four difficulty levels, allowing everyone, from rhythm beginners to experts, to enjoy the fun of cheering and calling.

For those unfamiliar with hololive, we hope you'll discover its charm through our energetic, heart-moving songs.

For hololive fans, this game serves as a practice tool for live concert calls.

And for those who couldn't get concert tickets, we hope this game provides some comfort and lets you experience the unity of a live venue.

name: HoloCall - Send Your Cheers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A rhythm music game where you press buttons while doing fan calls. Show your support for your favorite hololive idols by cheering with your voice!
